title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 - Dec 21 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 - Dec 21 2021
description:
We are witnessing the collapse of the Biden covid narrative in real time. NY health commissioner, vaccinated, boosted, mask obsessed, still sick with covid. What is the purpose of vaccine mandates to enter a NYC restaurant when the vaccinated can and do get infected and spread the covid virus? CNN's Dr Wen: Cloth masks are little more than facial decorations. Buck asks: Has Dr. Wen been listening to this show? Buck recalls his first time filling in for Rush Limbaugh and sitting behind the Golden EIB microphone when a doctor who helps opera singers had to come to his aid just before the show to open his vocal cords -- thanks to Buck's "supermom," to whom he lovingly wishes a Merry Christmas.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
